title: MinersKing
author: MinersKing
content: Hi guys, does anyone need Antminer S19? 82/86/90/95T are all on sale!If you have requirements, please contact us!If you think we are fraud, we can provide evidence to verify our company.

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: Are you limiting the disclosure of your identity to only those who express interest? Instead, why not consider making it public and allowing everyone to cross-check, thereby providing concrete evidence of your true identity?

comments.author: ICYNOTE2023
comments.body: The current Antminer S19 is no longer worth the results. due to high electricity costs, these miners are no longer able to produce according to expenses.

comments.author: MinersKing
comments.body: Quote from: ololajulo on July 24, 2023, 10:43:01 AMAre you limiting the disclosure of your identity to only those who express interest? Instead, why not consider making it public and allowing everyone to cross-check, thereby providing concrete evidence of your true identity?I can show you all the evidences you need. Let me introduce us first. We are MinersKing, a ASIC miner from China, our company has been established in Shenzhen for more then 13 years, and we have been satisfied in multiple platforms like Global Sources. You can find us in social media platfroms like Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc. You can also view our website via: www.minersking.com    And if you need any more information, please let us know
